This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Default "encrypted-media" feature policy ["self"] allows the top-level document.
PASS Default "encrypted-media" feature policy ["self"] allows same-origin iframes.
FAIL Default "encrypted-media" feature policy ["self"] disallows cross-origin iframes. assert_equals: expected "#NotSupportedError: requestMediaKeySystemAccess is disabled by feature policy." but got "#OK"
PASS Feature policy "encrypted-media" can be enabled in cross-origin iframes using "allow" attribute.
Harness: the test ran to completion.
